The other Capo 1 version of this song has the right tonality, but in the wrong Capo position. I use Barre chords on the F#, Bm, G and the A chord for the ‚Äúgetting nowhere‚Äù and ‚Äústarting over‚Äù lines to give it a fuller sound.
